data.message: It's like you got a better chance of winning the lottery then getting to ever meet you... I'd rather just write you a letter... but wouldn't want the disappointment of some bullshit response typed up that says...Hey no one here read shit you wrote.. wanna signature??? No, I just wish you could actually hear what I want to say.. but there's a million other people that feel the same damn way... oh well...Maybe one day...til then look forward to your new shit! ♡
